name: GB Studio Game: STRANDED
description:
CONTROLS:

Z: Interact/Proceed Dialogue

Shift: Open Inventory

Arrow Keys: Move Character

(You may have to use the arrow keys to move in a diagonal to enter in doors.)

NOTES: 

Small buildings are decorative

You can interact with the items in your inventory for additional information

CREDITS:

Character and Inventory Sprites and Music: Tricia

Tile sets used: 

- Beach and Hills: Horsten Vault

- Park tile set: Horsten Vault

- Game Boy Platformer Tile-set (FREE): GumpyFunction

If I used yours and left it out, please let me know.
